name: LocumTenens
0:
”Alexa, open locum tenens”
”Alexa, ask locum tenens to search for psychiatry jobs in Georgia”
”Alexa, ask locum tenens to connect me with an internal medicine recruiter”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: locum tenens
des:
This skill can be used to search for medical job opportunities in the United States. At the end of the search, Alexa can email you the results of the jobs for you to access and apply to on the LocumTenens.com job board. You can also connect with an expert recruiter to assist you with additional opportunities.

Just say: "Alexa, open locum tenens", to get started!
